bibl.title: Ethnical Strategies in Graeco-Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: The Thracians. - The Jews: Philo of Alexandria. - The Alexandrian pogrom in 38 A.D. - Conclusion. - "Modifying an expression coined by Claire Préaux, who spoke of étanchéité des cultures, we might characterize the situation as étanchéité des ethnies."
bibl.seg: GOUDRIAAN Koen, Ethnical Strategies in Graeco-Roman Egypt.
Per BILDE et alii (Edd.), Ethnicity in Hellenistic Egypt = Studies in Hellenistic Civilization. III (Aarhus, 1992) pp. 74-99.

The Thracians. - The Jews: Philo of Alexandria. - The Alexandrian pogrom in 38 A.D. - Conclusion. - "Modifying an expression coined by Claire Préaux, who spoke of étanchéité des cultures, we might characterize the situation as étanchéité des ethnies."
